description: Average power capacity.  If multiple years given, the average is taken.
Total available energy capacity, in MWh
Total power capacity built.  Ignores subsets of hours and returns the built capacity for the whole year(s).
Total power capacity retired.  Ignores subsets of hours and returns the retired capacity for the whole year(s).
Variable Operation and Maintenance paid, in dollars
Generation-weighted average of variable operation and maintenance costs
Fixed Operation and Maintenance paid, in dollars
Fixed Operation and Maintenance paid per MWh of energy generated
Fixed Operation and Maintenance paid, in dollars
Capital expenditures paid per MWh of energy generated
Variable costs for operation, including fuel and vom.
Variable costs for operation, per MWh of generation.  Includes fuel and vom
Average availability factor (i.e. energy capacity available / energy capacity)
Total energy flowing into all the buses in this region (not necessarily net flow into the region)
Total energy flowing out of all the buses in this region (not necessarily net flow out of the region)
Total energy curtailed in this region
Total energy flowing in this branch
Minimum sum of power flowing in these branches
